name: 陳偉堯
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的Fortran程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。本課程將以C/C++教導變數宣告、運算式撰寫、流程圖設計、擬程式碼建構、控制敘述、判斷敘述、分支敘述、重複迴圈、指標使用、字串使用、檔案讀寫、函數宣告、陣列應用和物件導向設計等課題。(學校規定之專業必修課程)
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction 
Week 2: Using code::blocks IDE
Week 3: Program structure and pre-processor
Week 4: Constants and variables
Week 5: Numbers and strings
Week 6: Arithmetic and logical operators
Week 7: Intrinsic functions
Week 8: If structure 
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10: Case structure
Week 11: While loops 
Week 12: For loops
Week 13: File processing
Week 14: I/O streams and data files
Week 15: Arrays and pointer
Week 16: Functions
Week 17: Classes and objects
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy: 平時成績40%、期中考30%、期末考30%
materials:
Bronson, G. J. (2013). C++ for Engineers and Scientists, 4th Edition, Course Technology, International Student Edition, 828 pages 滄海圖書

洪維恩(2010)C++教學手冊，第三版，旗標。

教師補充資料。
